Public Information Request
--------------------------

#### Texas Government Code, Chapter 552, gives you the right to access government records; and an officer for the public information and the officer's agent may not ask why you want them.  All government information is presumed to be available to the public.  Certain exceptions may apply to the disclosure of the information.  Governmental bodies shall promptly release requested information that is not confidential by law, either constitutional, statutory, or by judicial decision, or information for which an exception to disclosure has not been sought.

#### ​

* Texas Public Information Act Rights and Responsibilities

​

​

​

​

​

​

​

​

* Town of Annetta Public Information Act Request Form

​

​

​

​

​

​

​

The Town Council designates the following methods by which requests for Public Information can be made:

​

\*\*\*Some Fees May Apply\*\*\*

​

In person:  450 Thunder Head Lane, Annetta, Texas 76008

By mail to:  P.O. Box 1150, Annetta, Texas 76008

By electronic mail to:  [info@annettatx.gov](mailto:info@annettatx.gov?subject=Public%20Information%20Act%20Request).  Please ensure the Public Information Act Request Form is attached.

By facsimilie:  (817) 441-5666

If you need special accomodation to the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA), please contact our ADA coordinator, Annetta City Secretary at (817) 441-5770.

Town of Annetta
